title: Is Franco Colapinto an upgrade over Jack Doohan for Alpine?
summary: Jack Doohan was replaced by Alpine after just seven races, for a man with nine grands prix under his belt. So will Franco Colapinto do better than the Australian?

qa_pairs.question: Which driver was replaced by Franco Colapinto at Alpine?
How many grands prix has Franco Colapinto competed in prior to joining Alpine?
What is a common reason for a Formula 1 team to replace a driver mid-season?
